definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Just a little morphia for the worst ones.
sentences.chinese: 就一点点，给那些最重的伤号也好。

definition: to heal a wound/to recuperate (from an injury)
to return to one's unit/to go back to one's station in life
sick personnel/person on the sick list/patient
to be wounded/to sustain an injury
middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
